content: ^ I think this kind of says it all
It froze there for a while until I got fed up and force closed the app
Also as I was posting this it wouldn't let me post an image and a caption at the same time, I could only do one at a time
There also doesn't seem to be an equivalent of "Recent Topics" so the only way to find a thread I just posted is remember where I posted it, go to the list of all topics, and click on it.

(alternatively I could look at the bottom of "all messages", but scrolling that far, even with the "jump to bottom" arrow on the right, will mark all messages as read, and there's no way to mark things as unread)
Another issue: if I double tap the topic name (e.g. of it's taking a while to load and I think it's broken) it will open the topic twice, and hitting back won't actually do anything.

Joshua Nelson said:

Screenshot_20211004-225416.png

I get that a lot when I have connectivity issues.
I am at home, less than 20 feet away from my router. I have 1 Gb down.
